com.mousebird.maply
Interface QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteTileSource, TestImageSource
Enclosing class:
QuadImageTileLayer
public static interface QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource

The Tile Source is the interface used to actually fetch individual images for tiles. You fill this in to provide data for remote or local tile queries.

Author:
sjg

Method Summary
 int maxZoom()
          The maximum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

          The minimum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

minZoom

The minimum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

maxZoom

int maxZoom()
The maximum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

startFetchForTile

void startFetchForTile(QuadImageTileLayer layer,
                       MaplyTileID tileID)
This tells you when to start fetching a given tile. When you've fetched the image you'll want to call loadedTile(). If you fail to fetch an image call that with nil.

Parameters:
layer - The layer asking for the fetch.
tileID - The tile ID to fetch.
